Html:
Hi

 

I am getting (from my camera) blocks of u-Law encrypted Audio Data, I want to convert this to uncompressed standard Wave audio...

I can't seem to find any tutorials on how to decode a stream without a header?

 

Thanks

 

Mark

Hi Mark,

If you don't have the header, your a bit on your own. You can create a buffer that matches the stream, if you know exactly what the format of the buffer is going to be but I still don't think that would be a resolution that is going to support what you do due to the u-Law block - which would lead me to think this isn't a wave stream in the first place...

Cheers,
OpenSebJ
